channel.title: Tools on Jeff Russell's Webstead
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on Jeff Russell's Webstead

item.title: Virtual Mentors
item.description: High performers frequently emphasize the importance of quality mentors, and we’ve all experienced the value of learning from people who have been there and done that. Finding a great mentor can be a big challenge, though. Luckily, you can benefit from the wisdom of impressive people with “virtual mentors”. Let’s talk about why to bother with this technique: finding and building a relationship with a top notch mentor is a big challenge.
